alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Highlands, southeastern Manatee, northeastern Charlotte, DeSoto and northeastern Sarasota Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Southeast Arcadia to 9 miles east of Babcock Ranch. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Port, Arcadia, Southeast Arcadia, Myakka River State Park, Lake Suzy, Hidden River, Nocatee, Brownville and Fort Ogden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
